body.name: Hollyland Lark C1 Wireless Lavalier Microphone for iPhone, MFi Certified, Plug and Play, Noise Cancelling Wireless Lapel Mic with 656ft Transmission, Compatible with iPhone, iPad, Solo-Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 1 min
features: MFi Certified wireless microphone for iPhone/iPad: Designed for iPhone and iPad, plug and play. Lark C1 wireless lavalier microphone comes with MFi certified RX lightning interface, provides more clear and clean audio collection, maximizes reducing the background noise, and provides a reliable working performance. NOTE: For iPad without lightning interface were not support plug and play, unless the right official adapter was used.

One-Click Noise Cancelling: Lark C1 features with active noise cancelling function thanks to its excellent algorithmic chips, up to 14dB noise cancelling depth, a prefect solution when recording in outsides or blocking unwanted noise, which greatly improved your video’s audio quality.

Easily Monitor Even RX Plugged in: Lark C1 lapel microphone supports playback even RX plugged in, don't need to pull RX out of your device, easily monitor your video audio. Besides, for outside and longtime live stream users, Lark C1 provides continuous usage by charging your iPhone/iPad via RX, perfect for outdoors and all day long live stream users.

Hi-Fi Level Sound Quality: Lark C1 features wide frequencies ranging from 20Hz to 20kHz, with a sampling rate up to 48kHz/16bit delivering Hi-Fi sound quality, filling your video's audio with more detail and richness, and fullness.

Still Ultra Light Weight&Compact: Each TX was 11.8g, RX 10g, and thickness lower than 9mm. This unique form factor allows you to inconspicuously clip the TX on your coats and easily plug the RX into your mobile phone.
Package Contains: Not including the charging case. Transmitter*1, Receiver*1, Furry Windshied*1, User Manual*1, Warranty Card*1, USB-C charging cable*1, and Storage Case*1.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Digital Signal Transmission Technology, No More Interference Noise Lark C1 Wireless Microphone was Designed for Mobiles-Compatible with iPhone, iPad(with Lightning Interface), Adopt Digital Signal Transmission Technology, No More Background Noise, Providing a More stable and Clean Audio Collection.
MFi Certified Wireless Microphone ,Designed for iPhone,iPad Introduce Lark C1 wireless microphone system for iPhone, iPad, boasts uncompromising audio quality.

Previous page Up to 15 dB depth noise canceling, Providing a clear and clean audio performance. Long-Rang Transmission, Still Stable and Clear Incredibly low latency of 0.08s, 656ft transmission distance just as heard beside. RX only 7g, thickness lower than 9mm, Lightweight and not bulky when plugged into your mobile. 48 kHz sample rate and 16 bits depth, Deeply deduction rich sound details for you. Next page 1 OneClick Noise Cancelling 2 656ft Transmission 3 8H Battery Life 4 Still Ultra Compact 5 Hi-Fi Sound Level Quality

Speaker Play with RX Plugged Don't need to plug out the RX, you can still easily playback and monitor your video, greatly improving your creating efficiency and saving you time. Charging your Mobiles Via RX-Nonstop Working RX can be connected to your mobile charging cable and charge for your mobiles. Never need to worry about the low battery when working.

LarkSound App Supported You can download the "LarkSound" APP to Monitor your audio collection, adjust noise canceling level, and volume control. NOTE: The solo version doesn't contain charging case. For iPhone 15 or iPhone 15 Pro Series, please use an official USB-C to Lightning Adapter (NOT included) to connect the RX with your iPhone. Or please use the Lark C1 Android Version (Notice: Charging via RX and LarkSound App can not be used while using Android Version to connect.)

What MFi Mean? Why it's Important? The Lark C1 enrolled in the MFi Program and officially got the Apple MFi certification, which means that you can be sure that the Lark C1 for your Apple device is verified by Apple to be safe and compatible. How Do I Adjust The Volume? Download the" LarkSound "App, you can adjust the volume here. What Shoud I Do If I Want to Playback? Open the" LarkSound "App, and open the "speak play"funcation . What Should I Mind for Charging Mobiles While Working? Do not plug in or plug out the phone charging cable while the microphone was recording, it will cause the audio to disconnect for about 6 seconds. How to Pair TX with RX Again if Needed? Press the TX pairing button for 5 seconds till when it flashes quickly, then press the RX pairing button, till when it flashes quickly, after both TX and RX flash quickly, TX and RX will pair automatically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great clarity and battery life
reviews.reviewText: I use this when coaching my boys basketball team so I can look back on my coaching and also what I tell the kids in certain situations. I’ve got my phone mounted on a tripod about 20 feet away and it does a great job of catching my audio. it is easy to set up and comes with two different microphones which I love because my wife can be hooked up to one also. It charges in its case and I would highly recommend it to anybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than expected. Holy smokes.
reviews.reviewText: So the quality isn't quite as good as say, a professional streaming mic.... like the Wave 3....but the quality is definitely up there in that bracket for streamer mics.The distance/range on these suckers is bonkers. I can walk around my entire house and keep a stable connection. That's 2 stories, 6000 sqft. Walls and all.They come with a dead-cat/style cap to soften sounds, and have integrated noise cancelling which does a fair job. I don't even need Nvidia Broadcast to filter background noise, they do great on their own.They work with my phone and with my PCs. Unfortunately if you want both mics working, there's no way to limit / mute one or the other like a conference mic. I would hope they add the capability for easy self-muting so both mics can be active without an issue.Both mics CAN be active, sync well, and will work for hours, so if you wanted to use them for group-streaming on Twitch or jouranlistic endeavors, etc, you totally could.They can be individually hooked up to charging cables, which seems to let them keep running even if they're completely drained... and they charge very quickly from their dock/hub.They can be powered down completely independently, and they each have their own noise cancellation toggle.If you need a semi-affordable wireless / lapel mic, this is going to be a game changer for you. I use it for gaming and conference calls and it's amazing the freedom it brings.They're suck a non-bother, you forget you're wearing it.It would be nice to get a chirp or something to announce when it has a low battery, but the LED indicator usually gives me enough warning.There is another version of these which is a tad more expensive with some more features... but I do not regret my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, great sounding mics
reviews.reviewText: Ready to use right out of the box. The case is amazing and it couldn’t be easier to use these. Great quality. Love that it plugs into my phone with a case still on too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update: This little mic has really grown on me. For me, it’s so much better with the noise cancellation feature off. I get a much better sound. I gave an additional star.I feel like it made my voice sound a little nasally and I didn’t notice a huge difference between it and just projecting my voice out when recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Edit -- Works great!!
reviews.reviewText: Do not try to test this microphone using FaceTime. FaceTime assumes you're trying to both speak and listen at the same time (which requires signal cancellation in the microphone), and the Lark C1 doesn't support that. FaceTime knows this and defaults back to the internal mic. Using this microphone to broadcast a webinar over Zoom worked fantastically well. The sound quality is significantly better than those $30 lavalier mics and my audience loved the improvement. When not in noice cancellation mode, even ambient music came through. Seems pretty good for the price. I'm sorry my original review was bad -- turns out it was user error. I'm sure pleased now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT PURCHASE IF YOU HAVE IPHONE 15
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these in July of 2023 and use these often for work. I had to get a new phone since my other iPhone pooped out on me. I got an iPhone 15 pro max since it was the best deal my wireless provider was offering at the time. Well fun fact Apple changed their phone charging ports again. So I had to buy adapters for the charging port so I could plug the receiver for the mics in. The receiver still does not work and I reached out to Hollyland customer service and the only answer they provided is that the new iPhones aren’t comparable with their app so I’m basically SOL. Their response literally said “sorry for the inconvenience”. So now I’m out $110 with no solution because the app they provide doesn’t work with iPhone 15 and they said the adapters won’t work either. I wish I could return but I’m outside the return window. What a flaw in their product production. And honestly the mics were trash anyways.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best iOS mic for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I lost my original C1 and bought another because I love it so much for the following reasons:1. The plug-n-play convenience with iPhone is fantastic.2. Excellent audio quality3. Audio playback via iPhone speaker. The lightning connection doesn't disable the audio output like the original lightning to 3.5mm adapter. So I can monitor the sound right after the recording. This is especially useful when using it with iMove or CapCut editing software on iPhone.4. Its lighting charging pass-through port to allow charging and mic access at the same time.5. Noise reduction feature works great.6. Very lightweight and reliable. Ideal for gimbal work.It would be a perfect mic if it can add 2 additional features:1. Remote shutter control (press a button to trigger shutter. DJI mic has this feature.)2. 3.5mm audio output for wired headphone monitoring (I understand why it's not there as the DAC may increase the size and weight of the mic)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Content Creation Game Changer
reviews.reviewText: Shoutout to the review that explained how to set this microphone up for an iPhone with usb-c.I've been using this microphone for my TikTok and Reels videos and the difference is astounding. It blocks off distant noise, and keeps the voice crisp.Since I started using this microphone, I haven't had to charge it. It also connects and charges via usb-c, which is wonderful.I cannot say enough good things about this microphone set. If you're looking for great on the go mics, this is the one to go with.

Use this for my golf company when shooting content on the course. The best wireless mic’s we’ve ever used. Tried many more options you can just tell by the packaging and quality of the mics that these are miles above the rest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality microphone at an amazing pice
reviews.reviewText: I use radio microphones professionally and I can say that the really good ones cost a lot of money. But, I wanted something quick and easy that I could just pop onto my iphone and start shooting interviews. I was highly sceptical I could achieve that at the price point this product is on offer for! How wrong could I be? Let me tell you how good they are. With a couple of tips. The microphone (bluetooth transmitter unit) clips onto the interviewee lavalier style. So, a collar, a tie, but no further than a foot away from the mouth but not too close either. Make sure you use the included wind gag if outdoors. Inside that mic unit is the transmitter. This part of the two pieces will need to be charged with the USB cable. It holds a good charge, I have used it for the most of about an hour maximum, and it still plenty of juice left in it. The receiver, you plug into the bottom of your smartphone. You download an app. (all instructions for this come with the device) The app will enable you to control certain parameters. Like: level of background noise cancelation. I keep mine on minimum as any kind of processing lowers sound quality a little. And also, I don't film interviews anywhere really noisy anyway. Once you have plugged the mic receiver into your phone and turned on the transmitter (the mic unit) you will see it pair with the bluetooth light stopping flashing. Then you are ready to go. I would warn against your interviewees speaking really loudly, which some people tend to do when wearing a radio mic. If you are more than a few feet away they start to shout. They don't realise that the mic will pick up their voice without needing to. If they shout, it will distort a little. Next, you'll want to make sure it has recorded...so you play back your shot on the phone...but heck! There's no sound! That's because the device is still plugged into the smart phone....*but* there's a setting on the Hollyland app which you can activate which lets you hear play back without having to unplug the receiver each time. Works a treat. Also, remember, the receiver does not need to be charged, it gets power from your phone. Distance? Outdoors I have been 100 feet away line of sight and recorded perfect sound. And one other *important* point. The receiver is so small and so light, that you can use it when the phone is mounted on a stabilizing gimbal like the DJI Osmo Mobile 6, (available from Amazon) and it does not throw it off balance at all. This was the deal maker for me. A great combo. I am thrilled with this product. Thank you, Hollyland!

Vorneweg - ich nutze das Mikrofon für Videobotschaften Diverser Künstler in den Social Media Plattformen, also Instagram & Co!Nach langem Hin und Her, nach ettlichen Billig-Produkten reinfällen, hab ich mich für das Hollyland Lark C1 entschieden und habe es nicht Bereut. Obwohl mir vom Kundendienst mitgeteilt wurde, dass das Produkt nicht mit meinem Google Pixel 8Pro funktioniert, hab ich es trotz meiner Bedenken Bestellt, ich habe ja auch noch ein 2. Handy von Xiaomi (Mi 9T Pro).Das Mikrofon funktioniert mit meinem Xiaomi Einwandfrei und diese Tatsache stellte mich schon mal zufrieden. Danach hab ich das Mikrofon natürlich auch noch mit meinem Pixel 8 Pro getestet. Es funktionierte erstmal nicht. Ich habe dann in den Einstellungen ein Externes, Kabelgebundenes Mikrofon, gewählt und dann hat es Einwandfrei Funktioniert. Anzumerken sei, das ein Handy natürlich nicht sieht, ob am Mikrofon ein Kabel dranhängt. Ausschlaggebend war und ist, das der C Eingang ein Mikrofon ist ... mit oder ohne Kabel - Egal.Das Klangbild ist Hervorragend, weitere Einstellmöglichkeiten gibt es Via Knopfdruck am Mikrofon selbst - Rauschunterdrückung, Nebengeräusch Reduzierung. Auch in der LarkSound App sind weitere Einstellungen möglich. Was bei meinen Mobiltelefonen nicht funktioniert ist das Direkte mithören der Aufnahme, vielleicht hab ich es aber auch noch nicht gecheckt wie ich die Einstellungen verändern muss, dass das Funktioniert. Meines erachtens ist das aber auch nicht nötig denn ... ich höre ja sowieso was mein Gegenüber erzählt! Macht er einen Fehler wird die Aufnahme einfach Wiederholt.Erwähnenswert sei auch, das der Kundendienst hervorragend ist. Jede meiner Fragen wurden innerhalb von 24 Stunden Bearbeitet ... Fachmännisch!Die Verarbeitung ist sehr Gut, das Case ist sehr wertig sowohl von der Verarbeitung als auch Optisch. Die Aufbewahrungstasche ist Schön und erfüllt seinen Zweck.So kann ich guten Gewissens eine Klare Kaufempfehlung für dieses Mikrofon abgeben - Klasse Preis Leistungsverhältnis.

Très bon son pour le produit, je ne connais pas les DJi et cie mais ça faire largement l'affaire pour 2 fois moins cher. Livré avec le chargeur et la housse de protection. Belle qualité. Seul bémol : l'application dédiée ne fonctionne pas sous Ipad pro 2023 et iphone 15 pro max...peut être une mise à jour à venir ??
